errors.error_description: The README specifies a strict Python version requirement of `== 3.6`, which is overly restrictive and may cause installation or runtime issues for users with newer, compatible Python versions.
correction_candidates: Everything else uses the Python (>= 3.6, < 3.10) standard library.
Everything else uses the Python (>= 3.6) standard library.
Everything else uses the Python 3 standard library.
Everything else uses the Python standard library.
errors.golden_answer: Everything else uses the Python (>= 3.6) standard library.
